description: Retrieves the user metadata and attributes from the UserId in an identity store.

parameters.name: IdentityStoreId
parameters.description: The globally unique identifier for the identity store, such as d-1234567890. In this example, d- is a fixed prefix, and 1234567890 is a randomly generated string that contains numbers and lower case letters. This value is generated at the time that a new identity store is created.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The identifier for a user in the identity store.

nested_items.name: UserName
nested_items.description: A unique string used to identify the user. The length limit is 128 characters. This value can consist of letters, accented characters, symbols, numbers, and punctuation. This value is specified at the time the user is created and stored as an attribute of the user object in the identity store.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: The identifier for a user in the identity store.

nested_items.name: ExternalIds
nested_items.description: A list of ExternalId objects that contains the identifiers issued to this resource by an external identity provider.

nested_items.name: Issuer
nested_items.description: The issuer for an external identifier.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier issued to this resource by an external identity provider.

nested_items.name: Formatted
nested_items.description: A string containing a formatted version of the name for display.

nested_items.name: FamilyName
nested_items.description: The family name of the user.

nested_items.name: GivenName
nested_items.description: The given name of the user.

nested_items.name: MiddleName
nested_items.description: The middle name of the user.

nested_items.name: HonorificPrefix
nested_items.description: The honorific prefix of the user. For example, 'Dr.'

nested_items.name: HonorificSuffix
nested_items.description: The honorific suffix of the user. For example, 'M.D.'

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the user.

nested_items.name: NickName
nested_items.description: An alternative descriptive name for the user.

nested_items.name: ProfileUrl
nested_items.description: A URL link for the user's profile.

nested_items.name: Emails
nested_items.description: The email address of the user.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A string containing an email address. For example, 'johndoe@amazon.com.'

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: A string representing the type of address. For example, 'Work.'

nested_items.name: Primary
nested_items.description: A Boolean value representing whether this is the primary email address for the associated resource.

nested_items.name: Addresses
nested_items.description: The physical address of the user.

nested_items.name: StreetAddress
nested_items.description: The street of the address.

nested_items.name: Locality
nested_items.description: A string of the address locality.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The region of the address.

nested_items.name: PostalCode
nested_items.description: The postal code of the address.

nested_items.name: Country
nested_items.description: The country of the address.

nested_items.name: Formatted
nested_items.description: A string containing a formatted version of the address for display.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: A string representing the type of address. For example, 'Home.'

nested_items.name: Primary
nested_items.description: A Boolean value representing whether this is the primary address for the associated resource.

nested_items.name: PhoneNumbers
nested_items.description: A list of PhoneNumber objects associated with a user.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A string containing a phone number. For example, '8675309' or '+1 (800) 123-4567'.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: A string representing the type of a phone number. For example, 'Mobile.'

nested_items.name: Primary
nested_items.description: A Boolean value representing whether this is the primary phone number for the associated resource.

nested_items.name: UserType
nested_items.description: A string indicating the type of user.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: A string containing the title of the user.

nested_items.name: PreferredLanguage
nested_items.description: The preferred language of the user.

nested_items.name: Locale
nested_items.description: A string containing the geographical region or location of the user.

nested_items.name: Timezone
nested_items.description: The time zone for a user.

nested_items.name: IdentityStoreId
nested_items.description: The globally unique identifier for the identity store.
